history.proof: intros n k. split. - intros H. sfirstorder depth: 3. - destruct (le_gt_dec k n) as [H3 | H3]. + unfold rotate. simpl. rewrite Znat.Nat2Z.inj_gt. hauto l: on depth: 3use: subst_idx_var, rotate, lift_var. + hauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: assert (k - 1 <= n) as H4 by omega.
exceptions.exn: The reference omega was not found in the current environment.
The reference LiftTraverse was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
The reference omega was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros n k. split. - intros H. destruct H. + subst k. unfold rotate. simpl. rewrite LiftTraverse. rewrite subst_idx_var. rewrite lift_var. reflexivity. + omega. - intros H1 H2. destruct (le_gt_dec k n) as [H3 | H3]. + assert (k - 1 <= n) as H4 by omega. unfold rotate. simpl. rewrite LiftTraverse. rewrite subst_idx_var. rewrite lift_var. omega. + omega. - intros H. omega.
